page.title: 10HOME INTERIORS
page.content: HOUSING.My house is a semi-detatched red brick house. Kitchen. The kitchen is quite modern.It used to be divided up into four parts, but the walls were knocked down and now it is one big room.The cupboards are an orange colour.It has a piano in one corner and a chest of drawers in another.It is L shaped.The table is in the centre of the room ,we have had glass shelves put up.We have glass jars with a cork lid for them.The floor has brown tiles. DINING ROOM. The dining room is a rectangular shape. It has a green carpet and white wallpaper.The ceiling is green too.There is a big table in the middle of the room. The table has matching chairs.There is a stero,a record player and a lot of records.Beside the record player and
